page.title: 10Employment in Haslington.
page.content: There are twelve farms in the area,nearly all dairy farms.Despite this large number,few people are employed on the land.Few employment opportunities exist within the area and the largest employer is the Milk Marketing Board processing factory adjacent to the School which employs some 120 people most of whom travel from Crewe.The majority of people in the area travel to Crewe for employment.The majority of full-time workers are employedin the heavy engineering industry-the railway works being the largest employer. Apart from small shopkeepers and very small industry,there are few areas of employment within the surveyed area.
